forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning with showers during the afternoon. High 22C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 72F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
